section1_desc: Building Communities Based On Common Academic Interests

feature1.title: Interest Tag Recommendations
feature1.desc: Suggests relevant tags based on users' activities and interests.

feature2.title: Recommendation for Person, Event, Course, Information (PECI)
feature2.desc: Provides recommendations related to people, events, courses, and information based on user preferences.

feature3.title: Realtime chat
feature3.desc: Communicate with each other in real time.

feature4.title: Share a post
feature4.desc: Share content or information with other users on UpMate.

feature5.title: Bad Word Detector
feature5.desc: Identifies and handles inappropriate or offensive words in posted content.

feature6.title: Spam Detector
feature6.desc: Identifies and deals with messages or content deemed spam or irrelevant.

feature7.title: Explore about anything relate about user interest
feature7.desc: This explore content or information about topics or interests relevant to their interests.
